meanings.definition: A disk on which video material is stored.
meanings.sent1: I watched a movie on the videodisk.
meanings.sent2: The videodisk contained all our family videos.
meanings.sent3: The videodisk rolled away and started playing a cartoon by itself!
meanings.sent4: Her memories were like a videodisk, easily accessed and replayed.
meanings.sent5: The videodisk gleamed in the sunlight, holding precious moments within.

meanings.definition: A disk used for storing video data.
meanings.sent1: We need to back up the important files on a videodisk.
meanings.sent2: The videodisk was full of high-definition recordings.
meanings.sent3: The videodisk wore a tiny hat to protect its data!
meanings.sent4: His mind was a videodisk, storing every detail of the crime scene.
meanings.sent5: The videodisk hummed softly as it saved the video data securely.
